html:
blotted out, as a thick cloud. As a thick cloud blots out the sky, the Lord will blot out and remove our sins from his memory (Heb. 10:16-17; D&C 58:42).

return unto me. In Hebrew, to return (shub) is to repent.

I have redeemed thee. This statement refers to Christ's atonement, wrought on our behalf.
